segments.text: We used to be very friendly , but it seems now that my daughter ’ s marriage has taken its toll of our relationship .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t like her husband , that bad egg , but my daughter insists on marrying him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She is a grow-up . She can make her own decision .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wish she wouldn ’ t regret for her decision .
segments.speaker: S1
